message: Hi Stephen. What is the difference between Task.Run and QBWI if we are talking about performance and heuristics.You said that The ASP.NET thread pool heuristics are thrown off by Task.Run “unexpectedly” borrowing a thread pool thread and the problem is also that .net doesn't know about it, so it can cause performance problem right? Does the same apply for QBWI? Does QBWI hurt performance and heuristics? Or QBWI somehow tell asp.net "Hey, I will use this thread". Thanks
